function EP01_05()
    -- .承-2「疑惑と焦燥」
    SaveData.Title = "疑惑と焦燥"

    -- //BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0)

    MSG([[ Waking up from a nostalgic dream, the unchanging reality spread before me. A hospital room with walls and floor pure white, clean and sterile. The scent of disinfectant alcohol mixed with a faint floral aroma. ]])

    -- //CI：眠り続けるマリカ。 005
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI005a")
LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ And there, my sister Marika still asleep in the bed. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0059.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, sadness "...So this really is happening in reality." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ It seems I must have fallen asleep while nursing her. I hadn’t noticed because I was so focused on caring for her, but come to think of it, I hadn’t slept for over a whole day. ]])

    MSG([[ ...No, the more accurate way to say it is that I didn’t have the peace of mind to sleep. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s been a whole day since I was contacted at the hamburger place. The doctor and my mother explained everything, but I still can’t believe it. ]])

    MSG([[ To think my sister looks so healthy, with skin and complexion so vibrant, yet there’s a possibility she may never wake up again. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0060.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sadness "What happened to my sister at Yuriai Private Academy...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The doctor and mother’s exchange from yesterday is still etched in my mind. ]])

    -- //effect：セピア加工
FILTER_SCREEN(2)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000)

    -- //BU：モブ医者、モブ女性
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB14aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0001.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Heidoin-kun, no need to hold back. Please tell us quickly about Marika’s condition." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0001.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Is this alright with your child present? I can come back another day if you prefer." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0002.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "You know I hate delays, don’t you? Minato’s old enough to know the truth." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0002.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "...Understood. Then I’ll be direct." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0003.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "All injuries suffered when she was brought from Yuriai Private Academy three nights ago have been fully treated." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0004.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "We must observe until the head wound fully heals, but she’s already in a state where waking up at any moment wouldn’t be surprising." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0061.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, smile "R-Really!? So Marika-neesan will wake up soon!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0003.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Calm down. Don’t give vague answers just because a child’s here, Heidoin-kun. Are you really a doctor?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0004.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Will Marika wake up? Or not? Just tell us the conclusion." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0005.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "I’m sorry... but honestly, I cannot say anything definite." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0062.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, surprise "...Huh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0063.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, surprise "The treatment is complete, right...? Th-then why can’t you say for sure?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0006.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Yes, the treatment is done. She doesn’t even need a respirator; physically, there’s no reason she shouldn’t wake up any time." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0007.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Yet the coma continues. This symptom has no precedent. Even among our medical team, opinions differ as we try to determine the cause." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0005.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "That’s frustrating. In other words, for some unknown reason, she just won’t wake up no matter how long it takes, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0008.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Exactly... I can’t predict when she’ll wake up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0064.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, sadness "S-So what will happen to Marika-neesan...? Will she just sleep forever like this!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0009.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Unfortunately, at this point, we really don’t know... Physically she is fine, so we want to continue observing her progress." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0006.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Observing progress... I can’t hope for much. I’m preparing for her to enter a ‘vegetative state’ without recovering." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0065.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, panic "A vegetative state...!? Marika-neesan...!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0066.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, panic "Isn’t there anything that can be done!? Isn’t there anything I can do to help Marika-neesan!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0010.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "........." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0007.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Stay away from the doctor, Minato. Sorry. He gets too fired up when it comes to Marika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0011.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "No... confusion is only natural. Our medical team is doing everything we can for Marika’s recovery." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0012.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Going forward, you can choose either home care or continued hospitalization here." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0013.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Home care costs less, and you can monitor her condition anytime, so that’s reassuring." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0014.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "However, Marika’s symptoms are rare, so unexpected complications may arise. Home care carries the risk of delayed response to emergencies." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0015.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Hospitalization fees here are the biggest concern. If you choose hospitalization, we will cover part of the costs not covered by insurance." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0008.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Covering long-term hospitalization fees? That’s awfully kind. Feels like they want us to pick hospitalization." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0009.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "I wonder where those instructions came from." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0016.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "...No hidden motives. We simply intend to continue positive treatment to help Marika wake." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0010.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "...Fine. We can’t afford home care anyway. If they cover the costs, then hospitalization it is." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0017.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Then we’ll handle the details another time." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0067.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, serious "P-Please tell me... What happened to Marika-neesan? What was she doing at school so late at night!? Who took her to the hospital!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0011.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Stop it, Minato. Heidoin-kun wouldn’t understand. Even if he did, he can’t talk about it for his position’s sake." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0018.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "...Sorry. Ms. Ikusa is right. But I’ll give you my personal opinion as a doctor, setting aside my professional stance." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0019.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "If Marika is physically healthy yet won’t wake, it must be due to a psychological reason." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0020.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "Though medicine offers no explanation, there are many cases where emotions impact life and death." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0021.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Doctor】 "If the family doesn’t lose hope and continues engaging positively, things should improve." ]])

    MSG([[ Even the faint hope the doctor gave didn’t sink into my ears at that moment. ]])

    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //effect：セピア加工・終了
--FILTER_SCREEN(0)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ And so, to the present. ]])

    -- //BG：病室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //SE： 引き戸の開閉音
    PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")
    WAIT(500)

    -- //BU：モブ女性
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,100,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The hospital room door opened, and mother came in. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0012.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Still here, Minato? Go home and rest. You’re already exhausted from studying for your exams, aren’t you?" ]])

    MSG([[ Looking at me like I’m a nuisance, mother sighed deeply. ]])

    MSG([[ A career woman who values efficiency above all, my mother often showed disappointment toward me for being so hopeless. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely now she’s more upset about my sister collapsing than about me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0068.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, normal "I want to stay by her side a little longer. You know, sometimes she even responds to my voice. Maybe she notices me..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0013.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Didn’t you listen to the doctor? Those are just reflex movements. If her consciousness center worked, she’d wake up." ]])

    MSG([[ She crushed my words and continued. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0014.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Well, she apparently can hear your voice though." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0015.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "But they say the reason she won’t wake might be psychological, and until we understand that in detail, there’s no way to fix it. You have to give up for now." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0069.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, panic "The cause... Right! What about Yuriai Academy!? If she was found there, they must know something!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Mother shook her head, exhausted. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0016.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "I talked to the academy director today... but they said nothing helpful. Marika was popular at school, showed no signs of worry, and they just don’t know the cause." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0017.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "They even said they’d cover the medical costs if we keep it confidential." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0018.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "I accepted it because I don’t want my daughter caught up in scandal either." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0070.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, serious "Eh!? M-Mom, are you okay with that!? After something so awful happened to her, you’re fine not making it public!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0019.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "If it went public, it wouldn’t be seen as a crime, just a tragic accident people talk about for a while. And we can’t afford to keep her hospitalized anyway." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0020.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Following the academy’s proposal is the best option to avoid hurting anyone... Though it’s frustrating." ]])

    MSG([[ The irritation showing on mother’s previously calm face. I saw her fists clenched tight. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m stupid. My mom is surely frustrated too. ]])

    MSG([[ No parent could be happy with their child going through this. ]])

    MSG([[ I apologized to mother and, as she said, decided to go home and rest. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（朝）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    MSG([[ Every day after that, I went to my sister’s hospital room. ]])

    -- //BG：病室（朝）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

    MSG([[ But she never woke. ]])

    -- //BG：病室（朝）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

    MSG([[ She never woke. ]])

    -- //BG：病室（朝）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

    MSG([[ Never. ]])

    -- //BG：病室（朝）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

    MSG([[ Forever―― ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0071.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, smile "Marika-neesan, look! I did it! I got an acceptance letter to Yuriai Academy’s boys’ division!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I placed the acceptance letter I brought to the hospital by my sister’s bed and proudly snorted. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0072.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, smile "Now I can go to the same school as you! Hehe. Maybe I’ve finally caught up to you a bit?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0073.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, normal "Marika-neesan, do you think I’ve grown since before...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：眠り続ける姉 005
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI005a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ No answer from Marika-neesan. Though she’s right in front of me, she feels so much farther away than when we couldn’t meet at all. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0074.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, sadness "Hey, answer me... Marika-neesan. I’ve been trying so hard to catch up to you... This can’t be happening..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ No good. Once I say how I feel out loud, I can’t stop. ]])

    MSG([[ All the feelings I’d been holding back for weeks suddenly flood out with my tears. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0075.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, sadness "I want to talk again... I want to see you smile... Wake up...! Come back, Marika-neesan!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I unconsciously grabbed Marika-neesan’s hand. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, at that moment―― ]])

    -- //SE：鼓動
    PLAY_SE("SEa025.wav")
    WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0076.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, surprise "Eh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan grabbed my hand back. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely just an unconscious reflex. She didn’t take my hand back by will. ]])

    MSG([[ But that warmth was just like the times when she used to lead me home as a child. ]])

    MSG([[ It felt like finally meeting Marika-neesan again after years, and my cheeks softened as I laughed through tears. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0077.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, crying smile "I’m such an idiot." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Yeah. A total idiot. I worried alone, despaired on my own, gave up. I hadn’t grown at all since those times I was protected by Marika-neesan. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter what form, the fact that my sister is right here before me doesn’t change. ]])

    MSG([[ So what I must do is only one thing―― ]])


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0078.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, crying smile "Marika-neesan is... still alive. So there’s absolutely no reason to despair. I’ll save her from now on." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At that moment, the acceptance letter on the bed caught my eye, reminding me of a conversation with Riko-san on exam day. ]])


    -- //BG：ハンバーガー屋（セピア加工）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG001aa")
FILTER_SCREEN(2)

    -- //BU：素顔リラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0045.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Riko】Plain Lira, smile "At Yuri High, they give the title of ‘Princess’ to the four cutest girls on campus, and let them self-govern." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：病室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ba")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0079.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, surprise "That’s right... If those ‘Princesses’ handle self-governance, maybe they know something about Marika-neesan." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Even Riko-san, a middle schooler, reacted as if she knew my sister. ]])

    MSG([[ Those called ‘Princesses’ surely know more about the school’s inside than the board or teachers. ]])

    MSG([[ If there’s a clue to wake Marika-neesan, it has to be at Yuriai Private Academy, where she collapsed unconscious. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0080.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, serious "I’ve decided, Marika-neesan. I will absolutely uncover the truth behind what happened to you!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")

    -- //BU：モブ女性
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ That night, I honestly told mother my thoughts when she came to the hospital room. ]])

    MSG([[ Mother understood, but worried visibly and protested me investigating. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0021.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "It’s true the school wants to hide something about Marika. But it’s way too dangerous for a student to investigate their secrets." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0022.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "The school is a closed environment. As you saw today, they can easily sweep secrets under the rug." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0023.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "If the school finds out your plans, you don’t know what terrible things might happen to you. Do you understand the risks you’re taking?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0081.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, serious "I know the risks very well. But there’s no other lead. I will find out why Marika fell unconscious at school!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0082.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, serious "Please. Until I finish my investigation, hold off on any decision about life-support treatments! I will definitely wake her up!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0024.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Haaaah......" ]])

    MSG([[ Mother stared deeply into my eyes and sighed more deeply than I’ve ever seen. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0025.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Honestly... You and Marika both never listen once you start in. Fine. Do as you wish." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0026.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "But the decision must be made in one year. I researched a lot too, and if she remains vegetative for more than a year, chances of waking drop even further." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mother_0027.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mother】 "Delaying the decision beyond that doesn’t help anyone. Not us... nor Marika herself." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0083.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Casual clothes, smile "...Understood. Thank you, mother. I will save my sister within the year, no matter what!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ And so, my new school life starting in April took on an unbearably heavy purpose. ]])

    MSG([[ To discover within a year the reason why Marika-neesan won’t wake. Yuriai Private Academy surely holds some major secret about her. ]])

    MSG([[ I will uncover it no matter what. Even if it means making an enemy of the school. No matter how harsh the fate awaiting me. Absolutely.]])

    -- 　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_06")

end
